page.title: 15LIFE STYLES
page.content:
COMMUTER FAMILY This family consists of a mother, father and two sons. They spend their holidays equally in England and abroad The father is Managing Director of a building society.At Christmas they are visited by their relatives.Roast dinner is their favourite meal.If they eat out generally they'll eat in a hamburger restaurant.They own 2 cars. In the evenings they watch T.V.They visit the cinema about once a year.
VILLAGE FAMILY In this village family there is a mother, father and 3 girls.They spend their summer holidays on the Isle of Wight.The father is an Estate Agent. The whole family are only together at Christmas.The favourite meal is roast dinner.They run 2 cars.In the evenings the girls go to dance classes.(cont.)
